title: DOJ v. RealPage Inc. (Rental Pricing)
coordination_mechanism: Shared algorithmic pricing platform with sensitive info exchange
regulatory_reasoning: DOJ alleged RealPage facilitated anticompetitive pricing via non-public data sharing

title: FTC v. Hotel Pricing Coordination
coordination_mechanism: Dynamic pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: FTC found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: FTC v. Amazon (Third-Party Seller Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Platform-mediated seller pricing algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: FTC alleged Amazon facilitated seller coordination through pricing algorithms and data sharing

title: State AGs v. Uber/Lyft (Surge Pricing)
coordination_mechanism: Independent surge pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: State AGs investigated but found no evidence of coordination, only competitive pricing

title: DOJ v. Meyer Manufacturing (Supply Chain Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Supply chain coordination algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: DOJ found evidence of coordinated supply chain management through shared algorithms

title: EC v. Asus (Resale Price Maintenance)
coordination_mechanism: Resale price maintenance with algorithmic enforcement
regulatory_reasoning: EC found Asus used algorithms to monitor and enforce resale price maintenance
